Doc Ice 6 reviews Rating Details Category: Restaurants Hot Dogs Hot Dogs [Edit] 75 N Central Ave Elmsford , NY 10523 (914) 358-9333 Add Photos Hours: Mon-Fri 11:30 am - 7 pm
Sat 12 am - 7 pm First to Review David B. Edit Business Info Work Here? Unlock This Business Page Send to Friend Bookmark Send to Phone Write a Review 6 reviews for Doc Ice Reviews Matching: Search Reviews Sort by: Yelp Sort | Date | Rating | Elites' | Facebook Friends' Facebook Friends
From Reviewers You're Following
Reviews from Your Friends
6 reviews in English
Review from Dennis K.
7 friends 10 reviews
Dennis K.
White Plains, NY 3/9/2012 Hard to find even though it's on 9A in ELmsford (RIght next to Wendys fast food restaurant) This place has great Hot Dawgs. I love the New York City Dog with Sauerkraut and mustard and the Zorro with secret chipotle sauce, sauteed onions and relish.
If you are anywhere near Elmsford, NY this place is certainly worth finding if your hungry for a tasty hot dog or two or three!
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Rebecca R.
0 friends 2 reviews
Rebecca R.
Norwalk, CT 6/30/2012 1 Check-in Here So cute!!! Great dogs and snow balls! Wish they were open on Sunday's. Friendly dad and son service- def stop by!!
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Ron R.
32 friends 7 reviews
Ron R.
Somers, NY 10/25/2011 1 photo 12 Check-ins Here This place is down the road from where I work. I had no idea it was there until a bunch of us stumbled upon it. It's set back from the road so hard to see. They're specialty is hot dogs. You can a wide variety of toppings. My favorite is "Cheddah Heaven." They also have cheesesteaks, chicken wings, onion rings (which are the best I've ever had) The people working there are also very friendly. Everyone at my job have become regulars there.
Was this review…?
Useful (1) Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Matt C.
14 friends 1 review
Matt C.
Rye, NY 3/12/2012 2 Check-ins Here What a find! A great hot dog is not easy to find and these are perfect. All beef dogs with a snap to them. They have a big selection of topping to match anyones taste. Be careful to not drive by this place. Well worth the stop.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool

Review from Dani P.
0 friends 2 reviews
Dani P.
Arlington, VA 5/18/2012 They really take their time to make the most amazing stuff! Try the AM hotdog. You will be surprised how good it is. We had to call them back and let them know just how good!
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool

Review from David B.
1 friend 3 reviews
David B.
Peekskill, NY 8/4/2011 Driven past here 100 times. Never stopped. Got lunch there for work today. Had hotdogs, Cheesesteak sub, empanatas. All were excellent. Hotdogs were sabrett, with like 20 toppings.
